interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Helene Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Human Hair Body Wave Top Lace Closure (4"4") Part 8-20 Inch Naturl Black Bleached Knots (18 Inch)
Review Date: 2015/08/28
Store: Helene Hair
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Helene Hair', 'Color': 'Brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 5.4 x 1.5 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '889583690927'}
Review Text: These closures never disappoint. I usually get the 10 or 12 inch closures but this time I got the 18 inch closure and its still beautiful. The hair is soft and luscious as always and the ends are healthy and full. I used these closure every time I make a wig I DO NOT WEAR SEW-INS only wigs. I have purchased over 15 of these closures, I love them and will continue to buy.
Review Title: Great closure and great hair as ALWAYS!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Products:** Strong preference for high-quality human hair closures, specifically body wave styles. Engages exclusively with wig-making, not sew-ins.
  
- **Brand Loyalty:** Consistently purchases from a specific brand, indicating satisfaction and trust in product performance. Has made multiple purchases from this brand, suggesting reliability and customer satisfaction.

- **Product Length Preference:** Typically prefers shorter hair lengths (10-12 inches) but appreciates longer options (18 inches) for versatility, maintaining healthy and full ends.

- **Quality Expectations:** Focuses on soft, luscious hair with a natural appearance. Values healthy ends in hair products.

- **Reviewing Behavior:** Actively leaves positive reviews showcasing enthusiasm and strong recommendations for products that meet her standards. Expresses intent to continue future purchases based on previous satisfactory experiences.

- **Overall Trend:** Indicates a discerning approach towards hair care products with a strong inclination towards quality, convenience (wig-making), and brand consistency.
